com.davededavelukeaz.wumpus.model

Class GameMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • com.davededavelukeaz.wumpus.model.GameMap

  • public class GameMap
extends java.util.Observable
    Class that manages the game map and the characters within it. Provides methods for managing game models.
    Author:
    DaveDeDave, LukeAz
    See Also:
    Observable

      • move

        private void move(Character c,
                  CharacterSymbol cs,
                  Direction d)
        Allows you to move a character in a certain direction. If you try to go outside the grid, the character remains stationary for one turn.
        Parameters:
        c - character to move
        cs - symbol in the grid that represents the character to move
        d - direction in which to move the character

      • look

        private CharacterSymbol look(java.awt.Point p,
                             Direction d)
        It allows you to look at who is in the adiactive cells. This is used for warnings and to keep two characters from moving in the same cell.
        Parameters:
        p - character position
        d - direction in which to look
        Returns:
        character symbol present in the corresponding grid cell. It can be empty.

      • moveMiniWumpus

        private void moveMiniWumpus()
        Randomly moves miniwumpus within the map every turn

      • findEmptyCell

        private java.awt.Point findEmptyCell()
        Utility method to find an empty cell in the grid where to place the characters during the game initialization.
        Returns:
        free position inside the grid
